root: ^Nathan: Hey, nice to see you back.

c-0: ^Nathan: Been sitting here for a long time.
^Nathan: I have faced real nightmares awake. I don’t think anything of the kind will scare me at all.
^Nathan: I have been to the snowy mountains of Tibet, scorching desert of Rub' al Khali and so many more. Danger is my middle name.
^You: It seems you don’t belong here.
^Nathan: I don’t. I was about to… aghh never mind
c-1: ^You: Mister Drake, tell me about your adventure in Tibet.

^Nathan: It was the time I discovered shambala along the way. General Akazar he was trying to unleash this ancient mystic force on us. Of course we weren’t gonna let them. Oh, by we I meant Sully, Eleana and I.
c-2: ^Nathan: I fell out of a plane and right into that damned desert. I wandered for nights and days, until I was saved by the local people. After reuniting with Sully and Eleana, I was able to stop Katherine Marlowe from abusing the power in the forgotten city. We are literally fighting in a crumbling city.
g-0: ^Conditional: Nathan: Don’t you want to hear all my other adventures?

c-0: ^You: This Eleana seems more important than you are leading on.
^Nathan: Oh, she is my wife now.
c-1: ^You: It seems unreal that you are still alive.
^Nathan: Living in constant adventure is not the only way you could die. You can also die from a thousand paper cuts in an office.

c-0: ^You: What were you about to do beforehand?
^Nathan: I was about to get on a boat.
